TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CookieCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type CookieCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 提供 類別的執行個體 (Instance) 其集合容器 (Container)。

span.span: Provides a collection container for instances of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作介面，以提供一般機制，來處理 cookie 的集合。The class implements an interface to provide a general mechanism for handling collections of cookies. 比方說，這是在應用程式可儲存多部伺服器的 cookie 的情況下很有用。For example, this is useful in the case where an application is designed to store cookies for multiple servers.

summary.span: 取得可以逐一查看 的列舉程式。

span.span: Gets an enumerator that can iterate through a .

returns.span: 可以逐一查看 的 介面實作執行個體。

span.span: An instance of an implementation of an interface that can iterate through a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您應該使用僅可以讀取集合中的資料。You should use an only to read data in the collection. 列舉值無法用來修改基礎集合中。Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 列舉值並沒有獨佔存取權集合。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection. 建立列舉值時，它會擷取集合中的目前狀態的快照。When an enumerator is created, it takes a snapshot of the current state of the collection. 如果變更的集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除項目，此快照集取得同步，並列舉值會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, this snapshot gets out of sync and the enumerator throws an . 從相同的集合，在同一時間建立的兩個列舉值可能會產生不同的快照集的集合。Two enumerators created from the same collection at the same time can produce different snapshots of the collection.
